user_instruction: 'Send an update to TechVenture Partners (contact@techventurepartners.com) about our latest projects. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Project Details for TechVenture Partners Update

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. TechVenture Partners has asked for an update on Quantum Innovations’ ongoing and upcoming projects. Could you please help me compile the most recent information?

When you have a chance, could you:
• Review any relevant threads in Gmail for recent project discussions or announcements.  
• Check our Notion workspace for the latest project timelines, milestones, and highlights.  
• Share a brief summary (bullet points are fine) of key developments, anticipated release dates, and any notable achievements or partnerships we should highlight.

If possible, I’d like to send the update to TechVenture Partners (contact@techventurepartners.com) by [insert desired date], so receiving your notes by [insert earlier date] would be ideal.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
